vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Asher living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.39;
son of: Shual (H7777B);
brother of: Hanniel (H2592H) and Rizia (H7525)
§ Arah = "traveller"
1) a man of Asher
2) the prominent head of a family of returning exiles
3) another returned exile
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Ulá; tribu de Aser; (b)   jefe de familia; post exílico; (c)   padre de Secanías, suegro de Tobías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞拉 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "旅行者"
1) 一名亞設支派的人 (代上7:39)
2)被擄歸回的一個家族領袖 (拉2:5;尼7:10)
3)被擄歸回的一個家族領袖, 可能與 (2) 同一人 (尼6:18)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
亚拉 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "旅行者"
1) 一名亚设支派的人 (代上7:39)
2)被掳归回的一个家族领袖 (拉2:5;尼7:10)
3)被掳归回的一个家族领袖, 可能与 (2) 同一人 (尼6:18)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.5
§ Arah = "traveller"
1) a man of Asher
2) the prominent head of a family of returning exiles
3) another returned exile

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.6.18;
father of: Shecaniah (H7935M)
§ Arah = "traveller"
1) a man of Asher
2) the prominent head of a family of returning exiles
3) another returned exile
